name: PB&J Frozen Greek Yogurt Bark
author: Athletic Avocado
summary: A quick and easy frozen treat that your kids will love! It's healthy and made with all-natural ingredients! Store in an air-tight container in freezer for up to a month, If it will last that long.
ingredients: 4  fresh strawberries, sliced, or to taste
directions: Mix yogurt, mashed strawberries, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, maple syrup, and vanilla extract together in a bowl
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and spread yogurt mixture in a thin layer onto the parchment paper
Stir 2 teaspoons peanut butter and coconut oil together in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave until melted, about 30 seconds
Stir well and drizzle over yogurt mixture
Freeze yogurt mixture until solid, at least 2 hours
